[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-map-controls](./harp-map-controls.md) &gt; [LongPressHandler](./harp-map-controls.longpresshandler.md)

## LongPressHandler class

Class that can be used to track long presses on an HTML Element. A long press is a press that lasts a minimum duration (see the \[\[timeout\]\] member) while the mouse is not moved more than a certain threshold (see the \[\[moveThreshold\]\] member).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class LongPressHandler 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(element, onLongPress)](./harp-map-controls.longpresshandler._constructor_.md) |  | Default constructor. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [buttonId](./harp-map-controls.longpresshandler.buttonid.md) |  | number | Button id that should be handled by this event. |
|  [element](./harp-map-controls.longpresshandler.element.md) |  | HTMLElement |  |
|  [moveThreshold](./harp-map-controls.longpresshandler.movethreshold.md) |  | number | If the cursor moves more than the given number of pixels, it is not a long-press, but a pan. |
|  [onLongPress](./harp-map-controls.longpresshandler.onlongpress.md) |  | (event: MouseEvent) =&gt; void |  |
|  [timeout](./harp-map-controls.longpresshandler.timeout.md) |  | number | How long to wait (in ms) until a press is considered a long press. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./harp-map-controls.longpresshandler.dispose.md) |  | Removes all events listeners. No more events will be sent. |
